about_the_game:
Venture into the unknown with twenty tracks of dark fantasy music from composer Joel Steudler! Folk sounds from ancient times mix with metal guitar and eerie atmospheres to offer you a distinctly dangerous sound. Stirring themes evoke the unsettling mood of a place lost to otherworldly enemies and chaotic magic. You will find a little solace and a lot of adventure in this collection of troubled tracks!

Features:

* 20 music tracks suitable for battle, dungeons, themes and towns!
* 13 ME Musical Events for short dramatic moments!
* .ogg and .m4a formats included.
* Royalty-free music for use with RPG Maker VX Ace or the engine of your choice!

Tracklist:

* 20 BGM

Battle - Eldritch Enemies
Battle - Golem Grinder
Battle - Metal Monsters
Battle - Unnatural Usurpers
Battle - Weird Warriors
Dungeon - Beastly Barrows
Dungeon - Cadaverous Calm
Dungeon - Deeper Delvings
Dungeon - Twisted Tombs
Dungeon - Whispering Walls
Theme - Cursed Kingdoms
Theme - Fallen Empire
Theme - Opening The Portal
Theme - Otherworlders
Theme - Wayfarers Path
Town - Last Village
Town - Portal Chamber
Town - Ruined Castle
Town - Shrine of Contemplation
Town - Temporary Shelter

* 13 ME

Evil x 2 tracks
Heroic x 2 tracks
Rest x 3 tracks
Scary x 4 tracks
Suspenseful x 2 tracks

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
  • Graphics:1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Hard Drive:400 MB HD space

  • Memory:512 MB RAM
